- Rectangle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, area, perimetro, nome, name: str = %22Rect%22, p1: Point2D, p2:Point2D):%0A        super().__init__(area, perimetro, nome)%0A        self.name = name%0A        self.p1 = p1%0A        self.p2 = p2%0A%0A    def getName(self):%0A        return self.name%0A%0A    def getArea(self):%0A        largura = abs(self.p2.x - self.p1.x)%0A        altura = abs(self.p2.y - self.p1.y)%0A        return largura * altura%0A%0A    def getPerimeter(self):%0A        largura = abs(self.p2.x - self.p1.x)%0A        altura = abs(self.p2.y - self.p1.y)%0A        return 2 * (largura + altura)%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.name%7D: P1=%7Bself.p1%7D P2=%7Bself.p2%7D%22%0A%0A%0A
